tasks.setup-vendor: bash -c 'source ../../../.env && mkdir -p vendor && ln -sf "$MACROFORGE_TS_CRATE" vendor/macroforge_ts && ln -sf "$MACROFORGE_TS_QUOTE_CRATE" vendor/macroforge_ts_quote && ln -sf "$MACROFORGE_TS_SYN_CRATE" vendor/macroforge_ts_syn && ln -sf "$MACROFORGE_TS_MACROS_CRATE" vendor/macroforge_ts_macros'
